text: The Al Eslah Society () is an organization in Bahrain that represents a modern and moderate conservative Islamic views. Its political wing is the Al-Menbar Islamic Society. The president and patron of the Al Eslah Society is Shaikh Isa bin Mohammed Al Khalifa, a member of the Al Khalifa royal family and former labor minister of Bahrain. The name of the society is sometimes transliterated as "Al Islah Society" ==References== ==See also== * Mohammed Khalid ==External links== * Al Eslah website Category:Politics of Bahrain Category:Islam in Bahrain
title: Al Eslah Society
